name: MEC Heritage Reflective Rain Jacket - Children
description:
Go ahead, find the biggest puddle you can. We designed this fearlessly waterproof jacket so everyone can get out of the house on rainy days. Kids will stay dry at the playground on worm-seeking expeditions and while walking to school in downpours. Reflective hits add visibility on gloomy days.Made of durable 200-denier nylon with a polyurethane coating.Fully taped seams defy water from reaching inside.3-panel hood has reflective tape, an elastic opening and peaked brim for protection from wind and rain.2 front pockets with flaps keep mittens or snacks dry.Storm flap over zipper with snaps at top and bottom.Elastic cuffs seal out wind.Lots of reflective details for increased visibility.Interior hanging loop.

Relaxed fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
